name: ecss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cec(c0, c1), c2))
-| wss(cec(c0, c1), crn(c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(crn(c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cec(c0, c1), c2))
-| wss(cec(c0, c1), crn(c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(crn(c1), c2))

body.origin:
|- wss(cec(c0, c1), crn(c1))
-| wceq(cec(c0, c1), cima(c1, csn(c0)))
-| wss(cima(c1, csn(c0)), crn(c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cec(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(crn(c1), c2))
-| wceq(cec(c0, c1), cima(c1, csn(c0)))
-| wss(cima(c1, csn(c0)), crn(c1))

|- wi(w0, wss(cec(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(crn(c1), c2))
-| wss(cima(c1, csn(c0)), crn(c1))

|- wi(w0, wss(cec(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(crn(c1), c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(crn(c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wer(c1, c2))
-| wi(wer(c1, c2), wceq(crn(c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cec(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wer(c1, c2))
-| wi(wer(c1, c2), wceq(crn(c1), c2))

|- wi(w0, wss(cec(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wer(c1, c2))

comment: An equivalence class is a subset of the domain. (Contributed by NM, 6-Aug-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
